it.polimi.se2018.networking.server

Interface RmiServerInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RmiServerImplementation

    public interface RmiServerInterface
extends java.rmi.Remote
    The remote interface for the RMI communication.
    Author:
    michelemarzollo

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addClient(RmiClientInterface client, boolean isMultiPlayer)
      The method to add a client to the server.

    • Method Detail

      • addClient

        boolean addClient(RmiClientInterface client,
                  boolean isMultiPlayer)
           throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        The method to add a client to the server.
        Parameters:
        client - the client to add.
        isMultiPlayer - true if the client wants to play in multi player mode; false if it wants ti play in single player mode.
        Returns:
        true if the client has been added; false otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if there were problems of communication during a remote method call.

      • removeClient

        void removeClient(RmiClientInterface client)
           throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        The method to remove a client from the server.
        Parameters:
        client - the client to remove.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if there were problems of communication during a remote method call.

      • send

        void send(Message message)
   throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        The method to send a message to the server.
        Parameters:
        message - the message to be received by the server.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if there were problems of communication during the remote method call.
